title: Harmonic Lands $7M Funding to Secure Generative AI Deployments
description:
British startup is working on software to mitigate against the ‘wild west’ of unregulated AI apps harvesting company data at scale.

The post Harmonic Lands $7M Funding to Secure Generative AI Deployments appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: FBI: Thousands of Remote IT Workers Sent Wages to North Korea to Help Fund Weapons Program
description:
Thousands of IT workers contracting with U.S. firms have secretly sent millions of dollars to North Korea to fund its missile program.

The post FBI: Thousands of Remote IT Workers Sent Wages to North Korea to Help Fund Weapons Program appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: CipherStash Raises $3 Million for Encryption-in-Use Technology
description:
Australian startup ChipherStash raises $3 million in seed funding for technology that keeps data encrypted in use.

The post CipherStash Raises $3 Million for Encryption-in-Use Technology appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: US Government Releases Anti-Phishing Guidance
description:
CISA, NSA, FBI, and MS-ISAC have released guidance and prevention recommendations on common phishing techniques.

The post US Government Releases Anti-Phishing Guidance appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Google Play Protect Gets Real-Time Code Scanning
description:
Google improves Android devices’ proactive protections against malware with real-time scanning at code level.

The post Google Play Protect Gets Real-Time Code Scanning appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Number of Cisco Devices Hacked via Unpatched Vulnerability Increases to 40,000
description:
The number of Cisco devices hacked via the CVE-2023-20198 zero-day has reached 40,000, including many in the US.

The post Number of Cisco Devices Hacked via Unpatched Vulnerability Increases to 40,000 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: Operations of Healthcare Solutions Giant Henry Schein Disrupted by Cyberattack
description:
Healthcare solutions giant Henry Schein has disclosed a cybersecurity incident that disrupted operations and possibly led to a data breach.

The post Operations of Healthcare Solutions Giant Henry Schein Disrupted by Cyberattack appeared first on SecurityWeek.

title: North Korean Hackers Exploiting Recent TeamCity Vulnerability
description:
Multiple North Korean hacking groups have exploited a recent TeamCity vulnerability and Microsoft warns of potential supply chain attacks.

The post North Korean Hackers Exploiting Recent TeamCity Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
